title: Aanuoluwatofunmi
author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
content: Fidelity is signing a world classic cryptocurrency trademark with bitcoin.Amidst alot of speculations on the ground stand fidelity has with bitcoin adoption and use as an asset in it entire industry has become a pop up event that sparks alot of reactions from it decision to official accept and adopt engaging bitcoin for an asset as the most preferred digital currency than other cryptocurrencies, the link provided below also state their earlier stance and presentations with their first publication earlier this year about bitcoin being used for this purpose, now Fidelity is fully back at it to set the goal with bitcoin as it most preferred assets in cryptocurrency. https://twitter.com/DocumentingBTC/status/1607933293722324993?t=P242412LnouvadcFP6Jpjg&s=19
